definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: The cold overall tone in the image is brilliantly accompanied by the golden in the grass and on the towers.
sentences.chinese: 画中整体的冷色调连同金黄的草与塔尖，堪称完美。

sentences.english: Even the dye will have more depth and richness.
sentences.chinese: 其色调也染得更加到位和饱满。

sentences.english: A single print or piece of film combining half-tone and line work.
sentences.chinese: 结合半色调网点和线条图形的相片或菲林。

sentences.english: Black quilted tech fabric with tonal felt trim.
sentences.chinese: 黑色绗缝高科技面料与色调感觉修剪。

sentences.english: Some of these give a bluish or purplish tinge to the light.
sentences.chinese: 其中的一些让蓝或紫色色调的光线。

sentences.english: Make your cyanotype prints look like antiques with tea toning.
sentences.chinese: 让你的冷色调打印喜欢看古董茶色调。

sentences.english: Make your cyanotype prints look like antiques with tea toning.
sentences.chinese: 让你的冷色调打印喜欢看古董茶色调。

sentences.english: Any process which "stretches" the histogram has the potential to cause posterization.
sentences.chinese: 任何过程，“延伸”的直方图有可能导致色调分离。

sentences.english: Tonal Width Controls the range of tones in the shadows or highlights that are modified.
sentences.chinese: 控制被修改的阴影部或是高反差部分的色调范围。

sentences.english: The bleached wood flooring and neutral colors contribute to the feeling of spaciousness.
sentences.chinese: 退了色的木地板以及中性色调让空间显得更为开阔。

sentences.english: Paper with a dull egg-shell surface.
sentences.chinese: 有著像鸡蛋壳的暗淡色调的纸。

sentences.english: The sun's natural light will expose cyanotype prints.
sentences.chinese: 太阳的自然光会暴露冷色调打印。

sentences.english: Youthful hue, good concentration, thin pink rim.
sentences.chinese: 年轻的色调，色浓，边缘呈粉红色。

sentences.english: It shows a brilliant red ruby color with delicate brown tonalities.
sentences.chinese: 此款酒呈现明亮的宝石红色，并且带有棕色色调。

sentences.english: A closely related variety of chalcedony, sard , differs only in the shade of red.
sentences.chinese: 与肉红玉髓关系密切，不同的只在于红色色调上。

sentences.english: The green military uniform causes the picture to form the tone of color.
sentences.chinese: 绿颜色的戎衣使银幕天然形成为了色调。

definition: warm color (arch.)/esp. yellow, orange or red
main point of an argument/a principal viewpoint
